page.title: 06FARMING POTATOES
page.content: { { }Potatoes grow well because of the fertile soils and cool dry climate which prevents diseases and pests such as aphids. Potato merchants rent fields from surrounding farms and supply the labour. There are two markets; - seed potatoes sold to Mediterranean countries and table potatoes to local markets. Very high standards must be maintained to meet Goverment requirements. The main changes in potato farming are in automation of field management, use of herbicides and pesticides, and storage in special warehouses instead of under soil in mounds. Future changes will be in chromozone technology to produce millions of identical plant types. In B.of E. growing and marketing of potatoes is an important business.
